sentences.en: After the hour-long service, his body was taken to a cemetery in the south of the city.
sentences.cn: 在长达一小时的悼念仪式结束后，他的遗体被抬到了城南的一所公墓。

sentences.en: Brian Epstein was buried in a private ceremony at Long Lane Cemetery, Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 在利物浦朗雷恩公墓为布赖恩·爱泼斯坦举行了私人葬礼。

sentences.en: Friends and admirers crammed the chapel at the small Los Angeles cemetery where Monroe is buried.
sentences.cn: 朋友和仰慕者们挤进安葬梦露的洛杉矶小公墓的教堂里。

sentences.en: He lies at rest in the Martyrs'Cemetery .
sentences.cn: 他在 烈士陵园 安息着.

sentences.en: He rests in a cemetery in the western suburbs of Beijing.
sentences.cn: 他长眠于北京西郊的一个公墓中。

sentences.en: He walked numbly into the cemetery.
sentences.cn: 他糊里糊涂地走进了墓地。

sentences.en: He was buried in Highgate Cemetery.
sentences.cn: 他被安葬在海格特墓地。

sentences.en: He was buried in the cemetery.
He was buried in this cemetery three years ago.
sentences.cn: 三年前他被埋葬在这个墓地里.

sentences.en: Her father was laid in a cemetery.
sentences.cn: 她父亲安葬在一处公墓。

sentences.en: His remains have been exhumed from a cemetery in Queens, New York City.
sentences.cn: 他的遗体被从纽约市皇后区的墓地里挖了出来。

sentences.en: His remains were interred in the cemetery.
It was not a night in which any credible witness was likely to be straying about a cemetery, so the three men who were there, digging into the grave of Henry Armstrong, felt reasonably secure.
sentences.cn: 一个正直可信的人是不会在这样的一个夜晚里在墓地里游荡的，所以，理所当然，正在那里挖掘亨利?阿姆斯特朗墓的三个人是不会感到有所顾忌的。

sentences.en: The body was interred at that cemetery.
The body was interred at the cemetery.
The whole area has been shocked by the desecration of the cemetery.
sentences.cn: 对墓地的亵渎震惊了整个地区。

sentences.en: Their grief turned to hysteria when the funeral procession arrived at the cemetery.
sentences.cn: 当送葬队走到墓地时，他们更加悲恸欲绝。

sentences.en: Then we were at the entrance to the cemetery, and he asked.
sentences.cn: 不知不觉我们就来到了墓地入口，他又向我发问。

sentences.en: We got arrested once, for singing bawdy songs in a cemetery.
sentences.cn: 我们曾经因为在公墓唱下流歌曲而被拘留过一次。

trans.tran_en: a piece of land, usually not belonging to a church, in which dead people are buried
